00024 #ifndef SPOT_LTLAST_CONSTANT_HH
00025 # define SPOT_LTLAST_CONSTANT_HH
00026 
00027 #include "formula.hh"
00028 
00029 namespace spot
00030 {
00031   namespace ltl
00032   {
00033 
00036     class constant : public formula
00037     {
00038     public:
00039       enum type { False, True };
00040       virtual void accept(visitor& v);
00041       virtual void accept(const_visitor& v) const;
00042 
00044       type val() const;
00046       const char* val_name() const;
00047 
00049       static constant* true_instance();
00051       static constant* false_instance();
00052 
00053     protected:
00054       constant(type val);
00055       virtual ~constant();
00056 
00057     private:
00058       type val_;
00059     };
00060 
00061   }
00062 }
00063
